name: M.I.A (itch)
description:
Who is this disembodied voice giving me instructions? Why am I here? What does it all mean? 

You find yourself in a mysterious house surrounded by rocket wielding enemies who seem unwilling at best. Guided by a mysterious voice giving you instructions you make it to an exit, but on the other side are only more questions...

W - Forward

A - Left

S - Backward

D - Right

Space - Jump & Double Jump

E - Dash

Left Shift - Sprint

Left Control - Sneak

F5 - Quick Save

F6 - Quick Load

Esc - Pause
